sentences.en: But the photoperiod sensitivity of the tropical and subtropical maize blocked this process.
sentences.cn: 针对热带亚热带玉米种质这些特点,诱变可以发挥重要的作用.

sentences.en: Day - neutral plant A plant that requires no particular photoperiod to flower.
sentences.cn: 中间性植物:不需要特殊光周期就可以开花的植物.

sentences.en: Day-length sensing is an important biological function in plants and photoperiod is one of the key ambient factor determining the time of plant flowering.
sentences.cn: 日长感知是植物所具有的重要的生物学功能，光周期是决定植物开花时间的关键环境因子之一。

sentences.en: Objective To explore the effects of temperature and photoperiod on diapause of housefly larvae.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨温度和光周期对家蝇幼虫滞育的影响.

sentences.en: Photoperiod could affect the nutrient uptake and utilization in maize.
sentences.cn: 光周期可以影响玉米对养分的吸收及利用.

sentences.en: Photoperiod produces little influence on the diapause of housefly larvae.
sentences.cn: 光周期对家蝇幼虫滞育的影响不大.

sentences.en: Photoperiod sensitivity was the major obstacle of using tropical and sub - tropical germplasm in temperate zone.
sentences.cn: 光周期敏感性是热带、亚热带玉米种质在温带地区应用的主要障碍.

sentences.en: The experiment shows that photoperiod was an important environmental factor affecting armyworm development, reproduction and flight.
sentences.cn: 说明光周期是影响粘虫发育 、 殖和飞翔的重要环境因子之一.

sentences.en: The gibberellins interact also with photoperiod in the determination of flowering.
sentences.cn: 赤霉素也和决定开花的光周期有关.

sentences.en: The pistillody of stamens of 291 S could be induced under certain photoperiod and temperature condition.
sentences.cn: 291S在一定的光温条件诱导下会出现雄蕊心皮化现象.

sentences.en: This research suggests to increase flower produce in months flower production is not enough by controling flowering period by photoperiod , light intensity or growth temperature.
sentences.cn: 本研究拟以光周期、光照强度或生产温度对水仙百合做花期调控，期使其生产不足之月份产量增加；

trans.tran_en: the period of daylight in every 24 hours, esp in relation to its effects on plants and animals
